title: MC进入地图时崩溃
txt_content:
MC崩溃了，咋办
日志：

Minecraft: [11:03:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting integrated minecraft server version 1.12.2


Minecraft: [11:03:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair


Minecraft: [11:03:55] [Server thread/INFO]: Loaded 488 advancements


Minecraft: [11:03:55] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for level 0


Minecraft: [11:03:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 34%


Minecraft: [11:03:57] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 70%


Minecraft: [11:03:58] [Server thread/INFO]: Changing view distance to 8, from 10


Minecraft: [11:04:00] [Server thread/INFO]: 30266[local:E:93dce4e5] logged in with entity id 0 at (398.5, 56.0, -370.5)


Minecraft: [11:04:00] [Server thread/INFO]: 30266加入了游戏


Minecraft: [11:04:00] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving and pausing game...


Minecraft: [11:04:00] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '命令方块编程 v0.5'/overworld


Minecraft: #

Minecraft: # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

Minecraft: #

Minecraft: #  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x4e68f70b, pid=5192, tid=0x00001b54

Minecraft: #

Minecraft: # JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_151-b12) (build 1.8.0_151-b12)

Minecraft: # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (25.151-b12 mixed mode windows-x86 )

Minecraft: # Problematic frame:

Minecraft: # C  [ig7icd32.dll+0x5f70b]

Minecraft: #

Minecraft: # Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows

Minecraft: #

Minecraft: # An error report file with more information is saved as:

Minecraft: # E:\Minecraft\.minecraft\hs_err_pid5192.log

Minecraft: #

Minecraft: # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:

Minecraft: #   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp

Minecraft: # See problematic frame for where to report the bug.

Minecraft: #

[11:04:02] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: 1
[11:04:02] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: 1

replies.author: yzh11309
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft: # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

Minecraft: #

Minecraft: #  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x4e68f70b, pid=5192, tid=0x00001b54

Minecraft: #

Minecraft: # JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_151-b12) (build 1.8.0_151-b12)

Minecraft: # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (25.151-b12 mixed mode windows-x86 )

Minecraft: # Problematic frame:

Minecraft: # C  [ig7icd32.dll+0x5f70b]
这里写着你地图出现问题的地方
我建议是重新加载一遍地图
因为是说Java在运行地图环境出的问题
如果你Java没毛病那就是地图代码可能乱了
所以把地图重新找一个或者重新加载
跟版本也可能有关系 不同版本有不同的方块

replies.author: 虚无x
replies.txt_content: 重新下一个吧，我都是这样
